label: 弁
対訳語: Controller- The officials of the Controlling Boards (Benkan) under the Great Council of State (Dajōkan).
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: In charge of the work of the eight ministries (shō). Divided into the Great (Sadaiben), Middle (Sachūben), and Minor Controllers of the Left (Sashōben), and of the Right (Udaiben, Uchūben, Ushōben).
